General.Name: Chaoprayamahanakorn Public Company Limited
General.Description: Chaoprayamahanakorn Public Company Limited operates residential real estate business in Thailand. It engages in development and sale of real estate; and provides construction and rental services. The company also operates construction contractor and furniture and wall panel factory; hotel and medical hospital; and herbal pharmaceuticals business. Chaoprayamahanakorn Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
